mapper.select: SELECT A.IDX, A.NAME, A.GENDER, A.AGE, A.`SIZE`, A.NEUTER, A.CREATED_AT, AB2.NAME AS 'BREED', AB2.ANIMAL_TYPE AS 'TYPE', AP.NAME AS 'PERSONALITY', AS2.NAME AS 'ADOPTION_STATUS' FROM ANIMALS A JOIN ( SELECT AB.IDX, AB.NAME, AT2.NAME AS 'ANIMAL_TYPE' FROM ANIMAL_BREEDS AB JOIN ANIMAL_TYPES AT2 ON AB.ANIMAL_TYPE_IDX = AT2.IDX) AB2 ON A.ANIMAL_BREED_IDX = AB2.IDX JOIN ANIMAL_PERSONALITIES AP ON A.ANIMAL_PERSONALITY_IDX = AP.IDX JOIN ADOPTION_STATUS AS2 ON A.ADOPTION_STATUS_IDX = AS2.IDX ORDER BY A.IDX DESC LIMIT #{listSize} OFFSET #{cp}

SELECT A.IDX, S.USER_IDX, A.NAME, A.GENDER, A.AGE, A.`SIZE`, A.NEUTER, A.CREATED_AT, A.DESCRIPTION, AB.NAME AS 'BREED', AB.IDX AS 'BREED_IDX', AT2.NAME AS 'TYPE', AT2.IDX AS 'TYPE_IDX', AP.NAME AS 'PERSONALITY', AP.IDX AS 'PERSONALITY_IDX', AS2.NAME AS 'ADOPTION_STATUS', AS2.IDX AS 'ADOPTION_STATUS_IDX', S.SHELTER_NAME, S.SHELTER_PERSON_NAME, S.SHELTER_TEL, S.SHELTER_ZIP_CODE, S.SHELTER_ADDRESS, S.SHELTER_ADDRESS_DETAIL FROM ANIMALS A JOIN ANIMAL_BREEDS AB ON A.ANIMAL_BREED_IDX = AB.IDX JOIN ANIMAL_TYPES AT2 ON AB.ANIMAL_TYPE_IDX = AT2.IDX JOIN ANIMAL_PERSONALITIES AP ON A.ANIMAL_PERSONALITY_IDX = AP.IDX JOIN ADOPTION_STATUS AS2 ON A.ADOPTION_STATUS_IDX = AS2.IDX JOIN SHELTERS S ON A.USER_IDX = S.USER_IDX WHERE A.IDX = #{idx}

SELECT A.IDX, A.NAME, A.GENDER, A.AGE, A.`SIZE`, A.NEUTER, A.CREATED_AT, AB.NAME AS 'BREED', AT2.NAME AS 'TYPE', AP.NAME AS 'PERSONALITY', AS2.IDX AS 'ADOPTION_STATUS_IDX', S.SHELTER_NAME FROM ANIMALS A JOIN ANIMAL_BREEDS AB ON A.ANIMAL_BREED_IDX = AB.IDX JOIN ANIMAL_TYPES AT2 ON AB.ANIMAL_TYPE_IDX = AT2.IDX JOIN ANIMAL_PERSONALITIES AP ON A.ANIMAL_PERSONALITY_IDX = AP.IDX JOIN ADOPTION_STATUS AS2 ON A.ADOPTION_STATUS_IDX = AS2.IDX JOIN SHELTERS S ON A.USER_IDX = S.USER_IDX WHERE A.IDX = #{idx}
SELECT ADOPTION_STATUS_IDX FROM ANIMALS WHERE IDX = #{idx}
SELECT IDX FROM ADOPTION_CONSULTS WHERE USER_IDX = #{userIdx} AND ANIMAL_IDX = #{animalIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADOPTION_CONSULTS ( USER_IDX, ANIMAL_IDX, NAME, EMAIL, TEL, ZIP_CODE, ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL, HAS_PET, CONSULTED_AT, DESCRIPTION ) VALUES ( #{userIdx}, #{animalIdx}, #{name}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{zipCode}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{hasPet}, #{consultedAt}, #{description} )
